metadata.name: Inversion of Denial
metadata.description:
Acrylic on canvas 150 x 200 cm 2021

Physical Item Sold in Auction (Youngest Artist in the Auction)

Based on a poet by Omar Khayyam

The answer to perpetuity neither you know nor I The solution to lifeâ€™s enigma neither you know nor I

Beneath the curtain stand bantering you and I But when the curtain falls, neither you remain nor I
